text: Shibu Lal (born April 28, 1973) is a Bangladeshi tennis player who has played for Bangladesh Davis Cup team. He lost to US player Daniel McCall to 7–6, 6–2 in the first qualifier of Tiburon Open, United States. Born and raised in Dhaka, he left his country to pursue a professional career in tennis. He now lives in Northern CA with his three daughters.http://www.atpworldtour.com/en/players/shibu-lal/lc27/overview ==References== Category:Bangladeshi male tennis players Category:Living people Category:People from Novato, California Category:1973 births
title: Shibu Lal
